data.eml:eml: Two new terebellid polychaetes (Polychaeta: Terebellidae) from the state of São Paulo, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nogueira, João Miguel De Matos, Alves, Tarsila Montrezoro (2006): Two new terebellid polychaetes (Polychaeta: Terebellidae) from the state of São Paulo, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 1205: 31-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172367
